content: **drops crochet top in cotton viscose and vienna or baby merino and melody ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** xs/s s/m m/l - l/xl - xxl **materials** drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 150-200-200-200-250 g colour no 11 khaki green and use drops vienna from garnstudio 50-50-50-50-50 g colour no 16 moss green or use drops baby merino from garnstudio 100-100-150-150-200 g colour no 47 north sea and use drops melody from garnstudio 50-50-50-50-50 g colour no 08 petrol drops crochet hook size 4 / us g drops crochet hook size 6 / us j for borders and straps
